page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: People in{Norman}times did not have cars and buses as we do today. They only had horses and carts or their feet for transport. I think they were lucky because they did not have any trouble with the traffic but we are lucky because we can get around faster then they could. They did not need to spend money on petrol and oil as we do today in the 1980's. However they had to buy horses to pull their carts from place to place. People still ride horses today but today it is mostly for pleasure.
